basic_pointer_iserializer.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_POINTER_ISERIALIZER_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_POINTER_ISERIALIZER_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_pointer_oserializer.hpp: extenstion of type_info required for 
00011 // serialization.

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_archive.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/archive/detail/basic_serializer.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00024 
00025 namespace boost {
00026 
00027 namespace serialization {
00028     class extended_type_info;
00029 } // namespace serialization
00030 
00031 // forward declarations
00032 namespace archive {
00033 namespace detail {
00034 
00035 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_iarchive;
00036 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_iserializer;
00037 
00038 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_pointer_iserializer 
00039     : public basic_serializer {
00040 protected:
00041     explicit basic_pointer_iserializer(
00042         const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & type_
00043     );
00044     // account for bogus gcc warning
00045     #if defined(__GNUC__)
00046     virtual
00047     #endif
00048     ~basic_pointer_iserializer();
00049 public:
00050     virtual const basic_iserializer & get_basic_serializer() const = 0;
00051     virtual void load_object_ptr(
00052         basic_iarchive & ar, 
00053         void * & x,
00054         const unsigned int file_version
00055     ) const = 0;
00056 };
00057 
00058 } // namespace detail
00059 } // namespace archive
00060 } // namespace boost
00061 
00062 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00063 
00064 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_POINTER_ISERIALIZER_HPP
